name: listDigitalSignageContent
description:
List information about existing [Zoom Rooms digital signage](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360000030683-Zoom-Rooms-digital-signage) content in a Zoom account.
You can also access this information by logging into your Zoom account in the Zoom web portal and visiting the [Digital Signage Content](https://zoom.us/digitalsignage#/) page listed under **Room Management**. **Prerequisites:** * Pro or a higher account with Zoom Rooms. * Existing content files or folder in [Digital Signage Content](https://zoom.us/digitalsignage#/) page.

type.description:
Specify the type of digital signane resource. The value can be one of the following:
* `content`: Returns information about content files.
* `folder`: Returns information about the folder where the content files are located.

folder_id.description: Unique identifier of the folder where the content is located. Provide this field if you would like to filter the response by contents that are only available in a specific folder.

page_size.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

next_page_token.description: The next page token is used to paginate through large result sets. A next page token will be returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

$ul: **next_page_token**: The next page token is used to paginate through large result sets. A next page token will be returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.
**page_size**: The number of records returned within a single API call.
